data.name: Dark Horde
data.description:
Dark Horde

Units:
15% spell damage reduction
+30% buy cooldown
-5% evasion

Buildings:
+300 Tower range
200 minimum Tower range

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Damage

Traits: Very physical and brutal. Prefers close quarters face to face battle style. Fuck serving Demons. Fuck playing nice with others. Fuck weaklings and friendly collateral damage. TRUE Horde is here!

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Paralysis Aura
auras.description:
-20% unit move speed
(does not affect Special unit)
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Fear Aura
auras.description:
-15% unit damage
(affects non-Hero units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Devotion Aura
auras.description:
+8 unit armor
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Marauder [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Sunder
+1 level of Serrated Weapons

Marauder replaces Grunt
Melee Unit
+4 damage
+25 HP
Abilities:
Battle Cry (Support Spell)
(+10% damage in 400 AoE)
(does not affect Special unit)
Shield Block (Passive Skill)
(15% to block an attack)
Upgrades used:
Dark Iron Weapons
Dark Iron Armor
Battle Frenzy
Sunder (20% to activate)
Serrated Weapons
True Horde Resolve

Type: Anti Armor

units.name: Marauder
units.description:
Melee Unit
Strong Vs Ranged Unit
Weak Vs Spellcaster

Redridge Traper replaces Firetree Hunter

(10 damage/sec for 12 sec)
(affects organic units only)

(100 damage in 175 AoE)
(25% for it to be hostile)
Upgrades used:
Dark Iron Weapons
Dark Iron Armor
Battle Frenzy
Serrated Weapons
Net And Bola
True Horde Resolve

Type: Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Last (or First) Push [Z]
bonuses.description:
When Barracks hit points drop bellow 10% a massive Kodo will be unleashed on your puny enemies.
(can capture neutral buildings)
(can be unleashed manually)
(UW can bypass this skill)

Type: Base Defence / Suicide Run

spells.name: Last (or First) Push
spells.description:
When Barracks hit points drop bellow 10% a massive Kodo will be unleashed on your puny enemies.
(can capture neutral buildings)
(can be unleashed manually)
(UW can bypass this skill)

Type: Base Defence / Suicide Run

spells.name: Unleash Kodo [Z]
spells.description: Clockwise Barracks.

spells.name: Unleash Kodo [C]
spells.description: Counter clockwise Barracks.

spells.name: Unleash Kodo [X]
spells.description: Middle Barracks.

bonuses.name: Item Crafting [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Item Crafting
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [X]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [C]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Special Unit.

spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Strength Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Agility Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [F]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Special Unit.

bonuses.name: Steel Reinforcements [C]
bonuses.description:
Increases hit points of all your buildings by 2000, armor by 2 and reduces spell damage by 50%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon / Base Defence

spells.name: Steel Reinforcements
spells.description:
Increases hit points of all your buildings by 2000, armor by 2 and reduces spell damage by 50%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon / Base Defence

spells.name: Emergency Repair (Lv1) [S]
spells.description:
Restores 100 HP over 30 sec.
(can affect mechanical units)
(can target your enemy as well)
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero

spells.name: Chain Lightning - [Level 4]
spells.description: Calls forth a bolt of lightning that bounces up to 13 times, dealing <AOcl,DataA4> damage on the primary target. Each jump deals less damage.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold bounty for killing Heroes.
(let the dumb nabs feed you...)

Type: Anti Hero

upgrades.name: Fuck Heroes (Lv1)
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+20% damage reduction
+3 armor reduction
+1000 Aura range

spells.name: Cripple (Lv1) [W]
spells.description:
Reduces damage by 25% for 60 sec.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

spells.name: Chain Lightning - [Level 4]
spells.description: Calls forth a bolt of lightning that bounces up to 13 times, dealing <AOcl,DataA4> damage on the primary target. Each jump deals less damage.

towerUpgrades.name: Battle Frenzy
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage after a kill
Affects: Grunt, Firetree Hunter and Warlock
(affects summoned Drakes)

Lv1: +12% damage for 30 sec
Lv2: +24% damage for 45 sec
Lv3: +36% damage for 60 sec
Lv4: +48% damage for 75 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Sunder
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 15% to reduce armor
Affects: Grunt
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)
(affects summoned Corehound)

Lv1: -4 armor for 10 sec
Lv2: -8 armor for 12 sec
Lv3: -12 armor for 14 sec
Lv4: -16 armor for 16 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Serrated Weapons
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and 0.5 sec stun
Affects: Grunt and Firetree Hunter
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 9% for 2x damage
Lv2: 18% for 2x damage
Lv3: 27% for 2x damage
Lv4: 36% for 2x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Net And Bola
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and chance to ensnare
Affects: Firetree Hunter
(affects non-Hero units only)
(ensnare lasts for 10 sec)

Lv1: +4 damage, 15% chance
Lv2: +8 damage, 30% chance
Lv3: +12 damage, 45% chance
Lv4: +16 damage, 60% chance

towerUpgrades.name: Mighty Blow
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to stun
Affects: Firegut Brute
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)

Lv1: 9% for 1.2 sec stun
Lv2: 18% for 1.4 sec stun
Lv3: 27% for 1.6 sec stun
Lv4: 36% for 1.8 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Ogre Armor
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage block
Affects: Firegut Brute and Firegut Gunner
(affects Kodo Monster)

Lv1: 25% to block 20 damage
Lv2: 30% to block 30 damage
Lv3: 35% to block 40 damage
Lv4: 40% to block 50 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Goblin Munitions
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage and attack rate
Affects: Firegut Gunner
(affects Kodo Monster)

Lv1: +12 damage, +20% attack rate
Lv2: +24 damage, +40% attack rate
Lv3: +36 damage, +60% attack rate
Lv4: +48 damage, +80% attack rate

(has 5% chance to explode on attack)
(300 damage to everyone in 300 AoE)

towerUpgrades.name: Liquid Fire
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage over time in 150 AoE
Affects: Red Drake and Catapult Tower
(deals 50% damage to buildings)

Lv1: 6 damage/sec for 3 sec
Lv2: 12 damage/sec for 3 sec
Lv3: 18 damage/sec for 3 sec
Lv4: 24 damage/sec for 3 sec

spells.name: Liquid Fire (Lv1)
spells.description: 6 damage/sec for 3 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: True Horde Resolve
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus HP and regeneration
Affects: All non-Hero units
(affects summoned Drakes)
(affects Kodo Monster)

Lv1: +25 hit points and +2 HP/s
Lv2: +50 hit points and +4 HP/s
Lv3: +75 hit points and +6 HP/s
Lv4: +100 hit points and +8 HP/s

t1spell.name: Cannon Barrage [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoE.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Holy Fire [X]
t2spell.description:
Releases 6 Dragons for 180 sec.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

Buildings:

Traits: Very physical and brutal. Prefers close quarters face to face battle style. Fuck serving Demons. Fuck playing nice with others. Fuck weaklings and friendly collateral damage. TRUE Horde is here!

skills.description:
Kill friendly unit to summon help.

heroes.name: Warchief
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Battle Rage (Self Spell)
60-90% attack rate bonus
(has 15 sec duration)

Cleaving Attack (Passive Skill)
10-30% area damage

Unyielding Resolve (Passive Skill)
35% to block 30-60 damage

Bladestorm (Damage Spell)
100-160 damage/sec for 5 sec

heroes.name: Dragon Lord
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Dragon Master (Summoning Spell)
summons 1 random Dragon

Battle Cry (Support Spell)
12-30% damage bonus
(350-500 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Crucial Hit (Passive Skill)
15-27% for 3x damage, 1 sec stun
(affects organic units only)

Dragonbone Armor (Passive Skill)
22-28% to block an attack

heroes.name: Doombringer
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Void Wave (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line
(700-1000 wave distance)

Shadow Flame (Damage Spell)
12-24 damage/sec, -20% speed

Ogre's Strength (Passive Skill)
35% to block 30-60 damage

Twilight Gauntlet (Passive Skill)
24-30% to stun for 3 sec

heroes.name: Aspect of Death
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Dragon's Breath (Damage Spell)
325-475 damage in an area

Dragonflight (Summoning Spell)
summons 1-3 random Dragons

Take Flight (Damage Spell)
325-475 damage, 5 sec stun

Fire Core (Passive Skill)
60-90 damage to melee attacker

magic.name: Draconic Magic (Lv1) [W]
magic.description:
Gives:

(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

+0.25 MP/sec Warlock mana reg
+24 Red Drake damage
